nodes.text: Gila Yarg was a male Tarasin Jedi who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the final decades of the Republic Classic era.

A Force-sensitive Tarasin, Gila Yarg was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, studying independently in the ways of the Jedi Guardian after achieving knighthood. In 31 BBY, Yarg attended the SoroSuub Anniversary celebration in the city Tolea Biqua on the planet Genarius. He was one of a number of Jedi representing the Almas Academy, an experimental Jedi academy located on the nearby planet Almas, during the event.
